    #include <stdio.h>
    #include <string.h> 
    int x=1, y=2;
    int main() {
      int *p = &x + 1;
      int *q = &y;
      printf("Addresses: p=%p q=%p\n",(void*)p,(void*)q);
      if (memcmp(&p, &q, sizeof(p)) == 0) {
        *p = 11;  // does this have undefined behaviour?
        printf("x=%d y=%d *p=%d *q=%d\n",x,y,*p,*q);
      }
    }
[link to run test in Cerberus]
